column4: I need help with installation.. I cant see the complete setup box..!
I need help with installation.. I cant see the complete setup box on a 15 inch monitor..!
I need help with installation.. I cant see the complete setup box on a 15 inch monitor..! Can someone help??
what resolution are you running now?
I cant see the buttons on the setup box, the box is too big..
see if you can set it to 1024x768 with the Screen setup applet in the system-settings menu
How do i do it with the live cd?
go to system-settings menu, choose screen resolution
I have tried it, max resolution available is 800x600..
How do i force a particular resolution?
then you will have to install using the alternate CD. this runs in textmode
before installation from the live cd..
Is the text mode as simple as grapical mode?
you get a couple of questions, but nothing to be scared of
I am only worried about the hard drive partitioning part. Is it simple?
if you have a dedicated disk for ubuntu (no win on the same disk) there's a wizard doing it for you
I got to install it to hdd having xp and vista installed..
